00044                 public function hits_by_host()
00045                 {
00046                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00047 
00048                         $conn->prepare("SELECT `ip_addr`, `params`, COUNT(*) AS `weight` " .
00049                                         "FROM `visits` " .
00050                                         "WHERE `gate` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00051                                         "AND `date` >= '{2}' " .
00052                                         "AND (`ip_addr` LIKE '%{3}%' " .
00053                                         "OR `params` LIKE '%Apache'' => ''%{3}%') " .
00054                                         "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{4}%' " .
00055                                         "AND `user_agent` LIKE '%{5}%' " .
00056                                         "GROUP BY CONCAT(`ip_addr`, `user_agent`) " .
00057                                         "HAVING `weight` >= '{6}' AND `weight` <= '{7}' " .
00058                                         "ORDER BY `weight` DESC " .
00059                                         "LIMIT {8}",
00060                                         @$_REQUEST['p'],
00061                                         date("Y-m-d H:i:s", Time::ago(@$_REQUEST['t'])),
00062                                         @$_REQUEST['f'],
00063                                         @$_REQUEST['r'],
00064                                         @$_REQUEST['u'],
00065                                         @$_REQUEST['l'],
00066                                         @$_REQUEST['h'],
00067                                         9999);
00068                         $conn->exec();
00069 
00070                         $this->hosts = array();
00071                         if ($conn->num_rows() > 0)
00072                         {
00073                                 while ($line = $conn->fetch_assoc())
00074                                 {
00075                                         $host = Geoip::by_ip_addr($line['ip_addr'], $line['params']);
00076                                         $host->weight = $line['weight'];
00077                                         $this->hosts[] = $host;
00078                                 }
00079                         }
00080 
00081                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00082                 }
00083

00115                 public function last_n_visits($n)
00116                 {
00117                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00118 
00119                         $conn->prepare("SELECT `ip_addr`, `params`, COUNT(*) AS `weight` " .
00120                                         "FROM `visits` " .
00121                                         "GROUP BY CONCAT(`ip_addr`, `user_agent`) " .
00122                                         "ORDER BY `date` DESC " .
00123                                         "LIMIT {1}",
00124                                         $n * 3);
00125                         $conn->exec();
00126 
00127                         $this->hosts = array();
00128                         if ($conn->num_rows() > 0)
00129                         {
00130                                 $i = 0;
00131                                 while ($line = $conn->fetch_assoc())
00132                                 {
00133                                         $host = Geoip::by_ip_addr($line['ip_addr'], $line['params']);
00134                                         $host->weight = $line['weight'];
00135                                         if (!(empty($host->latitude) && empty($host->longitude)))
00136                                         {
00137                                                 $this->hosts[] = $host;
00138                                                 $i++;
00139                                         }
00140                                         if ($i >= $n)
00141                                         {
00142                                                 break;
00143                                         }
00144                                 }
00145                         }
00146                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00147 
00148                         $this->render(array('action' => 'hits_by_host'));
00149                 }
00150         }
